hero.title: Welcome to NIPPON GLOBAL ENERGY
hero.subtitle: Connecting Japan with the World – One Trade at a Time
hero.description: Welcome to NIPPON GLOBAL ENERGY, a Tokyo-based international trading and logistics company that embodies the spirit of Japanese craftsmanship and global business acumen.

list.title: We specialize in:
list.first: Automotive Supplies – Engine Oil, Tires, Car Parts
list.second: Logistics & Transport – Seamless movement of goods from Japan to Central Asia
list.third: Oil & Gas Solutions – Supplying pipes, drilling and construction equipment for energy projects

hero.more: We are more than just a trading house – we are your trusted business bridge between Japan and emerging markets, especially in Central Asia and the Middle East.
hero.slogan: 'Our commitment is built on trust, precision, and long-term partnership.'

description.first: Founded in the heart of Tokyo, NIPPON GLOBAL ENERGY is a new-age trading company deeply rooted in traditional Japanese values: Sincerity (Makoto), Harmony (Wa), Discipline (Shitsuke), and Kaizen (Continuous Improvement).
description.second: Our mission is to connect high-quality Japanese products and services with the growing demands of global markets, especially in Central Asia and the Caspian Region.
description.third: To be a reliable and innovative bridge between Japan and the world, facilitating commerce that creates mutual value and long-term prosperity.

stats.first: Integrity: We do what is right, not what is easy.
stats.second: Excellence: Every product and service reflects the precision and quality of Japanese standards.
stats.third: Respect: We believe in building long-term, respectful relationships with partners.
stats.fourth: Speed with Precision: Fast delivery without compromising quality or accuracy.
